name: Mexican Chicken Meatball Soup (Sopa de Albondigas de Pollo)
author: gem
summary: A delicious soup recipe. Ground chicken meatballs are simmered in chicken broth with zucchini and chayote. I like to serve it with fresh spinach, chopped avocado, lemon juice, and chipotle chile.
ingredients: 3  Roma tomatoes, seeded and finely chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2  chayote squash - peeled, cored, and cubed
directions: Combine 4 tomatoes, 1/2 an onion, and garlic in a blender
Heat oil in a soup pot over medium heat
Add the blended tomato mixture; cook until mixture changes color, about 5 minutes
Add chicken stock, reduce heat, and simmer while you prepare the meatballs
Place ground chicken in a bowl
Add 3 chopped tomatoes, chopped onion, egg, rice, mint, oregano, salt, and pepper
Mix well with your hands until mixture is uniform
Take about 1/4 cup of mixture and form into round meatballs using wet hands
Bring stock mixture to a boil
Place a meatball into a ladle and submerge into the boiling stock
Remove ladle and repeat with remaining meatballs
Place zucchini, chayote, and carrots into the stock
Lower heat, season with salt, and cover
Simmer until meatballs are no longer pink in the center and vegetables are soft, about 30 minutes
